reviewText: These are great movies for those who like the faith based movies. I find them comforting as well as just awesome. To think that Jesus would walk with us in the flesh and set in more modern day times is a wonderful thing to think about. There are other movies with different story lines as well. Pieces of Easter was humorous and has a story of reaching out to another and kindness and family unconditional love. I love the Jefferson Moore movies.
Kelly's Filmworks come up with movies that are brilliant and are treasures to hold.

I wish Jefferson Moore would make more movies.  They are the most spiritually educating movies we have seen in a long time.  You have to get this collection.  It makes wonderful viewing for all ages and is an excellent teaching aid for confirmation aged Christian chilldren.
Awesome set, love Mr Moore's moves. Lord will reward his amazing work.
Excellent movies. They involve modern down-to-earth people in down-to-earth situations with a Christian message in each movie.
I love all of Jefferson Moore's movies. Solid story, with really meaningful teaching through story.
Very good Apologetic message and lesson
Excellent, the perfect stranger is the best :)
I love these movies, what they are trying to get across and how they do it.  some of the ways they present things really make me think.  I wish there were more.

Awesome set of films by Jefferson Moore/Kelly's Filmworks.  I cried and felt forgiveness with "Clancy", I laughed and felt faith in "Pieces of Easter", I felt the presence of the Lord in the "Stranger" films and series.  "The Perfect Gift" showed the true meaning of Christmas.  "1 Message" shows the true meaning of beauty from God's eyes.  The soundtrack is precious.  This set is wonderful for the family and worth every penny.
I pray Jefferson Moore and Kelly's Filmworks produce more films.

A great collection especially The Stranger, we have used that in evening services as starters for discussion. All of them are great with a good message. I look forward to the next offering from Jefferson Moore.

I just recently discovered Jefferson Moore movies. He is a very talented writer, actor, and director. His movies are inspirational with an uplifting message. I also like the fact that he and his wife produce all of their movies. I highly recommend them.
These are excellent faith based movies. I have watched them over and over.
